purpose: This email is a call for participation in the 41st IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME 2025).
evidence_sentences: The IEEE International Conference on Software Maintenance and Evolution (ICSME) is one of the premier academic conferences for researchers and practitioners working on the maintenance and evolution of software systems.
ICSME 2025 will be held in Auckland, New Zealand, from Sunday, September 7 to Friday, September 12, 2025.
This is the first call for participation â€“ join us for a vibrant, global exchange of ideas in one of the most beautiful and dynamic cities in the southern hemisphere.
